title: OpenType Features Editor 1.4.0 Available
content:
Still working on improvements. The OpenType Features Editor is a free Windows application to help with OpenType font development. Check it out [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20140913094919/http:/www.timrolands.com/More/OTFE.aspx) and let me know what you think.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140913094919im_/http:/typophile.com/files/otfe-main_6183.png)
  
-t.
author: timotheus

comments.content: Hey, do you think it'll work also with complex Indian scripts such as Devanagari, Malayalam or Bengali too?

Well, it won't blow up or anything, but I don't think it will provide any useful feature generation, either. If you could send me some sample \*.afm and \*.fea files, I would be happy to add support.

-t.
